categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Kent Deezling was an Imperial deck technician at the Imperial security complex on Scarif. After incapacitating Technician Deezling in the stolen Zeta-class Heavy Cargo Shuttle SW-0608, Jyn Erso disguised herself in Deezling's armor to enter the research and development installation on Scarif during the Battle of Scarif.
